title: Halberds
content:
Halberds in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Halberds are Two-Handed Martial Weapons in BG3 that boast Extra Reach. They can only be two-handed, dealing 1-10 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 2.5m, and they deal Slashing Damage, though some special Halberds also deal another type of Damage as well.

Many Halberds have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Halberds in BG3. These Weapon Actions are Rush Attack, Lacerate, and Cleave.
